# moco-switch



<!-- Auto Generated Below -->


## Properties

| Property   | Attribute  | Description                       | Type      | Default     |
| ---------- | ---------- | --------------------------------- | --------- | ----------- |
| `checked`  | `checked`  | checked or not                    | `boolean` | `undefined` |
| `dark`     | `dark`     | style of the button (dark) or not | `boolean` | `undefined` |
| `disabled` | `disabled` | switch disabled or not            | `boolean` | `undefined` |


## Events

| Event      | Description                                        | Type                   |
| ---------- | -------------------------------------------------- | ---------------------- |
| `switched` | emits the state of switch (checked: true or false) | `CustomEvent<boolean>` |
